sections.heading: homestead; sale; proceeds; disposition
sections.text: If the sale is made, the proceeds thereof, to the amount of the homestead exemption, must be paid to the claimant, and the balance applied to the satisfaction of the execution.SourceLaws 1879, ยง 12, p. 60;R.S.1913, ยง 3087;C.S.1922, ยง 2827;C.S.1929, ยง 40-112;R.S
